sense.def:
An initiative
je pomembno dejanje, ki naj bi rešilo določeno težavo.

seg.quote: ...launching various initiatives to tackle real or imagined problems.

sense.def:
To have the initiative
pomeni biti v boljšem položaju kot naši nasprotniki.

To have initiative
pomeni biti sposoben ukrepati, ne da bi nam morali drugi povedati, kaj naj storimo.

seg.quote: In special circumstances we have to use our initiative.

sense.def:
To do something on one's own initiative
pomeni nekaj storiti, ne da bi nam to ukazal nekdo drug.

To take the initiative
pomeni biti prva oseba, ki nekaj stori.

seg.quote: In Sweden employers have taken the initiative in promoting health insurance schemes.
